mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A PK_TB_ARTICLE) */ ARTICLE_ID FROM TB_ARTICLE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ROWNUM <= #{limit}
SELECT ARTICLE_ID , COUNT(1) AS COUNT FROM TB_ARTICLE_READ_COUNT GROUP BY ARTICLE_ID
